items.title: Utah Ruling Exposes GOP Retreat On Redistricting Battle
items.description: As 2026 draws near, if things continue on the same path as they are now, Republicans can kiss their majorities goodbye.

items.title: The American Dream Is Harder To Reach For Millennials And Gen Z: Here’s The Math
items.description: A 50-year mortgage, an eight-year car loan, and a forever college payment. Is this the best we can do for our young people?

items.title: Democrats’ Favorite Talking Point About Children And Gun Deaths Is A Lie
items.description: Gun control advocates often claim that guns are the leading cause of death among children — but that is false.

items.title: It’s Impossible To Keep Up With The Fall Of Britain
items.description: The United Kingdom is now in a rolling crisis that its leaders can neither manage nor control. We should pay attention.

items.title: Justice Kennedy’s Memoir Illustrates The Shortcomings Of Flaky Conservative Jurisprudence
items.description: Kennedy's style of judicial interpretation is one that too often deviates from what the Constitution requires.
